metadata.title: CVE-2023-6840 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab EE affecting all versions from 16.4prior to 16.6.7, 16.7 prior to 16.7.5, and 16.8 prior to 16.8.2 whichallows a maintainer to change the name of a protected branch that bypassesthe security policy added to block MR.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
